IceLink Video Chat

Welcome!

To start the demo, enter your name and any six-digit session ID, then click Join. You will be connected to anyone else who joins using the same ID.


Open-source demos for Android, iOS, .NET, macOS, Java and more, as well as source code for this example are included in the IceLink SDK.

Note for Microsoft Edge 38 users: You will need to go to about:flags and check "Enable experimental H.264/AVC support". Learn more about H.264 and Edge on the Microsoft blog.

Note for Microsoft Edge and Safari users. These browsers do not support screen sharing. Camera video will be used instead.

Thank you for trying IceLink! If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
